ai-atk-s0402a18:1_0: Taking up the five kinds of direct-knowledge .
ai-atk-s0402a18:1_1: For the purpose of completely understanding:
ai-atk-s0402a18:1_3: When they give up these things:
ai-atk-s0402a18:1_5: When it comes to dispassion, it is good.
ai-atk-s0402a18:1_7: to plunge into the domain of generosity:
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_0: What is called rejection of refusing anger: that is to say, the state of excellence in anger,
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_1: To be modest about the reasoning of the characteristic of Uttiya,
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_2: His heart was overcome by conceit,
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_3: and being free from vanity, thinking it is subtle.
ai-atk-s0402a18:2_5: he is negligent, and he has the five kinds of sensual stimulation.
ai-atk-s0402a18:3_0: The successive permutation series is finished.
ai-atk-s0402a18:4_0: Discussion of the proper conduct for the upper garments
ai-atk-s0402a18:5_0: The commentary on the story of the Book is finished.
ai-atk-s0402a18:6_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-atk-s0402a18:7_0: if it is the upper limb.
